subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American goalkeeper Marcus Hahnemann allowed three goals in the last 15 minutes as Wolverhampton squandered a lead in a 3-1 loss at Tottenham in England’s Premier League.
snippet: The American goalkeeper Marcus Hahnemann allowed three goals in the last 15 minutes as Wolverhampton squandered a lead in a 3-1 loss at Tottenham in England’s Premier League.
